data.text:
Looking for authentic and original places, especially when it comes to food? The #Socialite tip: when in Bologna head for Tamburini, an old Bolognese delicatessen and try their #tortellini. And much more ;) 
https://t.co/Fh7ZpwqzOG 

#AlternativeGuide https://t.co/vDyHzWzp7h

It is scientifically proven that taste changes in the air due to the noise and altitude. This article is dedicated to #foodie #travellers. What kind of traveller are you? #AirDolomitiBlog 🍰🍾 https://t.co/PaFfliNb5E https://t.co/fnFbp34MDJ

data.text:
A slice of Italian cultural history is found in Caffè Marinetti, where the Italian Futurist movement was born. An unmissable stop-off for our #Intellectual and for those who love art, history and literature: https://t.co/61BPcq6odY
#AlternativeGuide https://t.co/mv2kq9qpdU

You land and find out that they’ve lost your luggage - don’t panic! Breathe, count to 10 and (re)read our advice on what to do in this situation. #AirDolomitiBlog #lostluggage #lostandfound https://t.co/Fz0WxpxAmx https://t.co/vButLdj8oV

Rising up above the medieval villages of the Apennine Mountains sits a Moorish castle with a curious mix of styles: #RocchettaMattei. Have you ever heard of the eccentric Count Mattei and his medical therapy called electromyopathy? https://t.co/sX9AZhJ8kl #AlternativeGuide #BLQ https://t.co/wMVlyIHp31

Hai sempre sognato di volare? ✈️
Se hai tra i 21 e i 45 anni e hai conseguito la licenza di pilota di linea, mandaci la tua candidatura e partecipa alle selezioni per entrare a far parte del nostro team! https://t.co/JG8D6LPZEN #AirDolomiti #DirectEntry #FirstOfficer #e195 https://t.co/M5WOdnD1QM
Thanks, @Aapiethemonkey for sharing your picture with us! You made our day! Wish you a lovely weekend! 🤩 https://t.co/j50Ewu7KeA

data.text: Se il tuo sogno nel cassetto è diventare #AssistenteDiVolo, non perdere l'occasione di iscriverti ai nostri Recruiting Days che si terranno a #Verona, #Milano, #Merano e #Bressanone a settembre! ✈️Ti aspetiamo! https://t.co/Ey2lBYVSC4 #cabincrew #AirDolomiti #VoliamoConTe https://t.co/iigjIk6OxG

data.text: @RicFelicetti @lufthansa Gentile Signor Felicetti, la ringraziamo molto per la sua segnalazione e cogliamo l'occasione per scusarci del ritardo e i disagi arrecati. Potrebbe gentilmente inoltrarci tramite messaggio privato, trattandosi di dati sensibili, numero del volo e giorno, per opportune verifiche?

data.text:
#Verona is the ideal place for #sportslovers! Via Torricelle, as well as being one of the most famous panoramic streets in the city, offers the perfect #running and #cycling route! ‍🏃‍♂️🚴‍♀️ #AlternativeGuide
https://t.co/AtzoUg2b2x https://t.co/WbUBNLu3aA
@Delta_Pops @Schiphol Such an amazing shot! Thank you for sharing 😊
Are you an experienced #TravelAgent who is looking for their next challenge? Join our team! https://t.co/nuLr5g4Sft ✈️#jobs #wehire #lavoro #lavoraconnoi #AirDolomiti https://t.co/BgYLlyfv8W

The beginning of the 20th century marked the birth of #Futurism, celebrating flight as "the highest expression of freedom of #movement and #dynamism" and paying homage to speed and innovation in every field! #AirDolomitiBlog https://t.co/mgLSNoidK6 https://t.co/yinqzxckRR
@jansche Dear Jan thank you very much for noticing 🙂 We will forward it to the dpt in charge and adapt it. Thank you once again for your precious contribution. BR/ Laure

One of the most incredible discoveries made by our #Socialite on her travels around #Verona is "The Gentleman of Verona", a boutique hotel just a few steps from the Arena. Read more at #AlternativeGuide 🎩
https://t.co/hy0IK2vTjx https://t.co/oqTngi1HC7

data.text: Thanks, @PITISPOTTERCLUB for this awesome photo! We really love it! 🤩✈️#avgeek #vrn #embraer #AirDolomiti https://t.co/8Y9OWsedLe
@imma3259 Per accedere alle selezioni non è necessario avere un attestato di lingua, ma garantire un livello di conoscenza minima delle lingue inglese e tedesca pari al B1.

Discerning travellers don't give up on comfort and like to have some fun. If you class yourself as a member of this category, your ideal hub should look like @munichairport! 🛬🛫😎 #AirDolomitiBlog https://t.co/cdPfTHuCOK https://t.co/6ngsNNhV4D

@brunoflorasales Dear Bruno, as the flight is a Lufthansa flight & only operated by Air Dolomiti, we would kindly ask you to directly check with the @lufthansa colleagues. At this link you can find some suggestions by the Geneve airport https://t.co/L8KyepNmcU BR/Laure
